fields.comment: if set, won't ever cache and the explosion happens that frame. Used for projectiles
fields.name: never_cache

fields.comment: Explosion radius, used to find the peasants and physics bodies that are thrown into the air
fields.name: explosion_radius

fields.comment: sprite animation of the explosion that we play
fields.name: explosion_sprite

fields.comment: if 1, sprite is emissive
fields.name: explosion_sprite_emissive

fields.comment: if 1, sprite is additive
fields.name: explosion_sprite_additive

fields.comment: if true, rotates the sprite to random 90 degrees
fields.name: explosion_sprite_random_rotation

fields.comment: if 0, finds the lifetime based on the rect animation currently playing. If not 0 it is seconds how long does the explosion sprite stay in the world
fields.name: explosion_sprite_lifetime

fields.comment: how much damage does this do to living entities
fields.name: damage

fields.comment: critical damage config. NOTE: must be already calculated ('chance' does nothing).
fields.name: damage_critical

fields.comment: camera shake - how much we shake the camera
fields.name: camera_shake

fields.comment: Should we use the ParticleEffect::DoExplosion()
fields.name: particle_effect

fields.comment: if set, this entity is loaded when the explosion is queued
fields.name: load_this_entity

fields.comment: Should the explosion emit light to its surroundings?
fields.name: light_enabled

fields.comment: The time it takes for the light flash to fade out
fields.name: light_fade_time

fields.comment: Color red 0-255
fields.name: light_r

fields.comment: Color green 0-255
fields.name: light_g

fields.comment: Color blue 0-255
fields.name: light_b

fields.comment: The radius of the light will be explosion_radius * light_radius_coeff
fields.name: light_radius_coeff

fields.comment: Do we remove ground, creata a crater
fields.name: hole_enabled

fields.comment: Do we remove solid cells that aren't platforms?
fields.name: destroy_non_platform_solid_enabled

fields.comment: How many electricity entitities should we create?
fields.name: electricity_count

fields.comment: Cracks are created if explosion_radius is larger than this
fields.name: min_radius_for_cracks

fields.comment: How many crack entitities should we create?
fields.name: crack_count

fields.comment: How far do entities get thrown if a knockback occurs? final_knocback = explosion_radius * knockback_force * target.inv_normalized_distance_from_explosion / target.mass
fields.name: knockback_force

fields.comment: Do we destroy the liquid cells we ran into, or do we just throw them into to the air?
fields.name: hole_destroy_liquid

fields.comment: Do we destroy the dynamic physics cells we encountered?
fields.name: hole_destroy_physics_dynamic

fields.comment: The material destroyed cells might turn into.
fields.name: create_cell_material

fields.comment: The probability a destroyed cell is turned into 'create_cell_material'
fields.name: create_cell_probability

fields.comment: Parallax background lightning count is set to this on explosion
fields.name: background_lightning_count

fields.comment: spark material, TODO moved these to use a special Serializer
fields.name: spark_material

fields.comment: How many sparks are we creating (rand max)
fields.name: material_sparks_min_hp

fields.comment: How many sparks are we creating (rand max)
fields.name: material_sparks_probability

fields.comment: How many sparks are we creating (rand min)
fields.name: material_sparks_count_min

fields.comment: How many sparks are we creating (rand max)
fields.name: material_sparks_count_max

fields.comment: Should we create few fire particles around the explosion
fields.name: material_sparks_enabled

fields.comment: if the spark particles created are real or fake
fields.name: material_sparks_real

fields.comment: if true, will create more sparks the harder the material
fields.name: material_sparks_scale_with_hp

fields.comment: Should we create few fire particles around the explosion
fields.name: sparks_enabled

fields.comment: How many sparks are we creating (rand min)
fields.name: sparks_count_min

fields.comment: How many sparks are we creating (rand max)
fields.name: sparks_count_max

fields.comment: If 'sparks_enabled', Sparks are created in the area between circles defined by 'explosion_radius'*'sparks_inner_radius_coeff' and 'explosion_radius'
fields.name: sparks_inner_radius_coeff

fields.comment: Should we stain the ground and other particles
fields.name: stains_enabled

fields.comment: The distance from the edge of the hole to the edge of the stained area, 0.0f for default which is 0.3 * explosion_radius
fields.name: stains_radius

fields.comment: This is the energy we have per ray. Could be called 'penetration power' or something like that. If cells have a hp of 20 rays with 100 energy can penetrate 5 cells
fields.name: ray_energy

fields.comment: When destroying cells only cells with a durability <= max_durability_to_destroy will be affected
fields.name: max_durability_to_destroy

fields.comment: How many particles to create in case we do gore stuff?
fields.name: gore_particle_count

fields.comment: Should we shake vegetation around the explosion (uses the area of stain_image to find vegetation)
fields.name: shake_vegetation

fields.comment: Look for peasants and throw them into the air? Remember to enabled physics_throw as well if you want them to actually fly
fields.name: damage_mortals

fields.comment: Should we throw physics objects into the air, also peasants
fields.name: physics_throw_enabled

fields.comment: how hard do we throw physics objects
fields.name: physics_explosion_power

fields.comment: treat the ragdolls a bit differently from other physics objects, to get them to fly nicely
fields.name: physics_multiplier_ragdoll_force

fields.comment: used when a solid cell explodes as the multiplier to how big the radius is going to be
fields.name: cell_explosion_power

fields.comment: when cell explodes, this is the minimum radius that explosion is made of
fields.name: cell_explosion_radius_min

fields.comment: when cell explodes, this is the minimum radius that explosion is made of
fields.name: cell_explosion_radius_max

fields.comment: cell explodes only when body velocity is greater than this
fields.name: cell_explosion_velocity_min

fields.comment: how much fire damage is required before this explodes
fields.name: cell_explosion_damage_required

fields.comment: this is used when there's a tiny contact that doesn't cause an explosion, in those cases this is used as a random to check if we should explode or not
fields.name: cell_explosion_probability

fields.comment: ragdoll cells destruction power is multiplied with this
fields.name: cell_explosion_power_ragdoll_coeff

fields.comment: if enabled will carve out the pixel sprites
fields.name: pixel_sprites_enabled

fields.comment: if 1, we apply some special digger logic to this explosion
fields.name: is_digger

fields.comment: Do we play an explosion sound?
fields.name: audio_enabled

fields.comment: Name of audio event in 'explosion' audio bank. If not set, will default to 'explosion' or 'explosion_small' based on explosion radius.
fields.name: audio_event_name

fields.comment: value of the 'liquid_amount' parameter passed to the explosion's audio event
fields.name: audio_liquid_amount_normalized

fields.comment: if > 0, the explosion occurs with a delay chosen randomly from this range and is never buffered
fields.name: delay

fields.comment: for delayed barrel explosions... this has to be set and has to be the same for the explosions for there to be a delay
fields.name: explosion_delay_id

fields.comment: the entity that caused the explosion
fields.name: who_is_responsible

fields.comment: if set, will not call DamageModelSystem::TakeDamage()
fields.name: null_damage

fields.comment: if set, this entity doesn't receive damage from the explosion
fields.name: dont_damage_this
